mapper.select: SELECT Name FROM city WHERE CountryCode = (SELECT Code FROM country WHERE Name = #{selectedCountry});
SELECT * FROM roommateboard WHERE country = #{selectedCountry} AND city = #{cityName} ORDER BY num DESC
SELECT files FROM roommateattach WHERE roommateNum = #{num}
SELECT lng, lat FROM citiescoordiates WHERE city = #{cityName}
SELECT count(*) FROM roommatelikes WHERE roommatlikeseNum = #{num} AND userNum = #{userNum} AND userType = #{userType}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM roommatelikes WHERE userNum = #{num} AND roommatlikeseNum = #{boardNum} AND userType = #{userType}
mapper.update: UPDATE roommateboard SET view = view+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM roommateboard WHERE city = #{cityName} AND country = #{selectedCountry} AND (boardTitle LIKE #{search} OR boardContent LIKE #{search})
SELECT Symbol FROM currency WHERE Country = #{selectedCountry}

SELECT * FROM roommatechat WHERE receiveuserNum = #{num} AND receiveUserType = #{userType} GROUP BY sendUserNum ORDER BY textDate DESC
